captionText: Winning isn’t everything, it’s the only thing.
author: Vince Lombardi

captionText: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn’t work hard.
author: Tim Notke

captionText: The only way to prove that you’re a good sport is to lose.
author: Ernie Banks

captionText: The more difficult the victory, the greater the happiness in winning.
author: Pele

captionText: The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in a person’s determination.
author: Tommy Lasorda

captionText: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
author: Billie Jean King

captionText: The harder you work, the luckier you get.
author: Gary Player

captionText: It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up.
author: Vince Lombardi

captionText: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

captionText: The only way to prove that you’re a good sport is to lose.
author: Ernie Banks
